snippet: No one was hurt in the fire at the offices of the Israeli Information Center for Human Rights in the Occupied Territories, which has been at the center of a political dispute.
abstract: Israeli authorities investigate fire at Jerusalem office of B’Tselem, Palestinian advocacy group criticized by government for soliciting foreign donations; arson suspicions were also raised by timing of blaze, which occurred one day after television report hinted organization member informed Palestinian security about Palestinians selling land to Jews.
lead_paragraph: No one was hurt in the fire at the offices of the Israeli Information Center for Human Rights in the Occupied Territories, which has been at the center of a political dispute.

headline.main: Israeli Police Investigate B’Tselem Office Fire
